entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Bachelors Island
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness near noon. 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming north 20 km/h early this afternoon. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 16 this morning and minus 10 this afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CDT Sunday 19 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 19.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 14 this evening and minus 25 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CDT Sunday 19 March 2023

entry.title: Monday: Mainly cloudy. High minus 8.
